name: Super Mario Galaxyâ„¢ 2
description: It is time once again for the Stardust Festival, held once every hundred years when the Mushroom Kingdom is showered in shining stardust. Receiving an invitation from Princess Peach, Mario heads for the castle accompanied by a stray star child he found wandering the cosmos. But when Mario arrives at the castle, it's already too late. Bowser has harnessed the power of the stars and whisked the helpless Peach away. An epic cosmic quest to rescue Peach is about to begin... Mario sets off for the stars in an all-new adventure! Explore wild and wacky planets in the search for Power Stars. Join the one and only Mario as you journey to mind-blowing planets where all-new pitfalls and perils await you.
